snippet.title: Beat Blitz - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
“Beat Blitz” is a hardcore indie, rhythm-platformer releasing on Steam and mobile October 24, 2022. Jump and Roll your way through a gauntlet of platforming challenges, all while collecting beats to create dope music!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2051540/Beat_Blitz/
